How does AlphaFold-Multimer contribute t: By predicting interaction interfaces between nanobodies and the spike protein.
By synthesizing nanobodies directly from sequence data.
By identifying viral mutations that affect nanobody binding.
By generating nanobody sequences with enhanced binding affinity.
